title: CARRY.GG Update! Been working hard on summoner profile, match history, match stats and timeline!

embed.description: League of Legends live game search. Find out how well your opponents farm, which roles they main, and how hard they carry.

body:
>**Quote from hashexclamationpoint (Creator of carry.gg )**

>Hey guys. It might seem that CARRY.GG has been quiet for a while, but we've been hard at work on some new features over the past couple months. Check out the new summoner page with match history, runes, masteries, and champion performance. Click on a match in the history to see its detailed stats and scoreboard playback.
We've got a lot more features we want to add in the coming months. What things would you guys like to see?

--------------------------------------------
I've spoken with the team over it carry.gg, about posting this on our boards and they were all for it. also asked if we could compile a list of improvements or features we would like to see in the future.


Leave your suggestions below and i'll compile them and send them over to the guys at carry.gg


Live Match Screenshots

http://puu.sh/iRdex/8068f92d9a.png


Profile overview

http://puu.sh/iRdg7/9a6448d11f.jpg

http://puu.sh/iRdiT/b48ce7befc.jpg

replies.body:
OH wow the match history is really nice!

It would be cool if there were indicators of kills/deaths on the timeline aswell so it was easy to jump to when I died.
